analysis.description:
ClearToken.rescueToken (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#578-587) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_foreignToken.transfer(_to,_foreignToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#584-587)

ClearToken.fallback (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#390-401) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < endTimestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#393-396)

ClearToken.updateEthICOVariables (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#438-459) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < _newEndTimestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#448-449)

ClearToken.startICO (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#467-482) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < endTimestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#475-477)

ClearToken.anyoneEndICO (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#502-515) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endTimestamp) (/unique_contracts/0x410af23334e26aa13c1f3e630bae006bdd313264.sol#507-510)
